#text=The other day , I decided to ride the bus to work since my car had broken down .
#text=It was a cold day in January as the rain had just fallen the night before .
#text=I sat nearby the rear-door of the bus and felt he air-conditioner blowing onto my neck and watched the street signs to see how much further my stop was going to be .
#text=I had been riding on the bus for approximately 15 minutes and stopped three times so far .
#text=We came upon a busy intersection where the bus stop was crowded with what appeared to be fifteen or so people huddled by the bench area waiting to get on .
#text=Slowly the people in queue walked onto the bus steps and piled into each available space as quickly as they could .
#text=After driving for two more blocks , I noticed my stop and pressed the button to signal the driver to drop me off .
#text=I stood up from my seat and headed to the door and left to go to work .
